author: craigmcc
msg: Allow initDataSources() to throw ServletException like the other
initialization methods do, to indicate a fatal initialization error.

author: mschachter
msg: - Modified DiskMultipartRequestHandler to attempt to retrieve the value of
all other possible temporary directories specified
- Fixed bug in MultipartIterator that incorrectly parsed filenames from

author: craigmcc
msg: Refactor the hyperlink-generation code used in the <bean:include>,
utility methods based on URLs rather than Strings.  This will ensure
consistency in implementation, and make it easy to provide full
URL-processing functionality to other tags as necessary.

author: craigmcc
msg: Use the containers existing facilities to encode the session ID into the
URL that is used for the URL connection created in <bean:include>.

author: vmassol
msg: modified build mechanism for enabling run of cactus unit tests on both Tomcat 3.2 and Tomcat 4.0 servlet engines
